participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: Shy yet passionate, Ethan often finds it hard to express his feelings but has a deep love for music and his family.
participant_1.background: I have a crush on a girl from my class, but I'm too afraid to tell her. I love my family, but they can be very critical of me. I listen to a lot of strange music. While both my parents have thick European accents, I do not. I work part time in the campus library.

participant_2.name: Maya
participant_2.personality: Creative and introspective, Maya enjoys the quiet moments of life, balancing her love for fitness with her artistic pursuits.
participant_2.background: I keep fit by drinking a lot of tea and practicing my sport. When it rains, I put on my headphones, grab a cup of coffee, and lose myself in my sketch book. Watching sports is fun. My internal arguments are often more interesting than my conversations with others. I'm a car enthusiast searching for a quiet, private home with plenty of space for my vintage cars.

content.text: It is going well, I am about to have a cup of tea and do some sketching.
Sounds relaxing. I am working part time in the campus library.
That sounds like a fun job, do you get to read a lot?
Yes, I do, and I also get to listen to music.
That sounds nice. I like to listen to music when I read, too.
What kind of music do you like to listen to?
I like a lot of different kinds of music, but I am particularly fond of classical music.
I like classical music too, but I also like listening to strange music.
Strange music? What do you mean?
Well, I like listening to music that is not very popular or well-known.
Oh, I see. I like to listen to music that I can dance to.
I do not dance, so I do not have much use for dance music.
That is okay, everyone has their own preferences
